title: Task
statement: A unit of work with a title, description, assignee, and status that moves through a Kanban workflow.
constraints: Tasks are created in 'backlog' status by default
Status transitions follow: backlog -> in-progress -> review -> done
Only the assignee or a project admin can change task status
Title is required (1-200 chars), description is optional (markdown supported)
Priority is one of: low, medium, high, critical

metadata.rationale: Establishes shared vocabulary for tasks and their lifecycle.
